dct_title_s: Map of the Grand Trunk Road from the Karamnassa to the Sutledge, in two parts : exhibiting the staging bungalows, encamping grounds, dak and overseers' choukies, post office, thannahs and tuhseeldaries
dct_description_sm: Shows Grand Trunk Road, major settlements and district boundaries, from Agra in the west to Benares in the east.; Relief shown by hachures.; This map is chiefly compiled from the lithographed district maps published in the Surveyor General's Office ...; Signed: P.W. Willis, Major, Supt. Grand Trunk Road.
58 x 235 Centimeters, folded to 32 x 25 Centimeters
Ames Library of South Asia Maps
dct_creator_sm: North-Western Provinces (India). Superintendent, Grand Trunk Road
dct_publisher_sm: Office of the Supt. Grand Trunk Road (Allahabad)
